definition: to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: It's more narrow than my very broad discussion.
sentences.chinese: 相比今天的泛泛雜談，下次的課會更加深入。

sentences.english: In the last day of Gulangyu, it was relaxed a lot relatively.
sentences.chinese: 雜談在鼓浪嶼的最後一天，相對悠閒很多。

sentences.english: He pens a column in Yingyuzatan. It becomes one of the most widely read here.
sentences.chinese: 他在英語雜談寫一個專欄，是點擊率最高的文章之一。

definition: colloquial (rather than literary) pronunciation of a Chinese character
lit. to play the lute to a cow (idiom)/fig. offering a treat to an unappreciative audience/to cast pearls before swine/caviar to the general/to preach to deaf ears/to talk over sb's head
to change at once on seeing sth different (idiom); loving fads and novelty/never satisfied with what one has
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
lit. a notch on the side of a boat to locate a sword dropped overboard (idiom); fig. an action made pointless by changed circumstances
Pride and prejudice, novel by Jane Austen 珍·奧斯汀|珍·奥斯汀
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
